website_summaries.verdict: Well-priced pet stairs available in 3 configurations. Steps won't slip out of place because of high level of construction.
pros: Pet owners say foam steps provide plenty of traction
Shape holds up well over plenty of traffic from pets
cons: May be too steep and narrow for some pets to use
Some customers felt product lacked enough stability for larger pets to feel comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Saves my back. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Only had this 4 days and today the last one of my 4 s/m dogs got up by himself with lots of silly verbal encouragement. But at least I didn't have to help him physically, which is why I wanted the steps. The are firm and well balanced. They have to make a jump from the top step to the bed which is 36", but the stairs stay put on the wood floor. I was planning on attaching a Velcro tie, but now I'm thinking I might not need to. Biggest dog is almost 30 lbs.Unless they get so confident that they start launching off it at 40 mph...quick shipping, after searching and searching, I'm thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Water Girl

customer_reviews.title: We love it! Perfect for our higher than normal bed ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Perfect for our higher than normal bed and now we don't have to lift our little one up and down. She now knows the commands "upstairs" & "down stairs"
customer_reviews.author: High Octane

customer_reviews.title: Strong, soft, comfy and tall enough to reach high beds/sofas
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of pet stairs. (I purchased the 5-step model, with fleece cover.) * Tall enough to allow my senior cat to get up to the top of a really tall bed. * Washable! How cool is that! * Its made from a very sturdy foam: lightweight, but strong. * Its placed next to my bed where I am prone to running into it in the dark. The fact that its made from foam keeps me from stubbing my toes. * My cats also like the soft, warm, fleece cover. * Great price and delivery. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: luciellenc

customer_reviews.title: Stable, pretty, tall, no slide and quiet stairs
customer_reviews.text: We love these stairs. My two 14 lb Dogs weren’t sure first day but They quickly adjusted and now I wonder how we lived without them. They are the perfect size for my tall bed, they don’t slide around on tile floor like plastic stairs, they look nice and most importantly, I don’t hear dogs all night getting on and off bed. I never realized how loud previous stairs were until these. They are pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: easterner789

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 15 lb dog
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our 15 lb schnauzer. I didn’t know what to expect but for a dog his size they were great. Easy to pick up and move. Very lightweight but did a great job at supporting him getting on the bed. He refused to climb down them and it took a couple treat enticements to get him to use them in the beginning but he became a champ at running up them. I don’t know why he wouldn’t go down them but he still preferred to jump off the bed. We have a rather tall bed too and these were the perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: I love these stairs for my small dog!
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated because of the price but so happy I ordered. Quality is good. Very lightweight. I worried that the foam would be flimsy because it’s so light but nope!....I have stood on it myself and it retains its shape. Very durable. I have a very high bed on an adjustable base and these stairs were perfect. I love the sheepskin fabric. Love that I can take off and wash, although I cannot attest to how it will hold up after a wash, as I haven’t had to clean it just yet. My 2 year old pomchi is about 8 pounds and it’s perfect for his size. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy R.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My tiny Beagle mix was having difficulty using her old, hard plastic steps. They had a fleece cover but there were fewer steps so they had higher risers. Our bed is tall and she needed something better. These are taller and much easier for her to use going up and down. They are soft and she doesn’t slip at all. She was used to the old steps and didn’t hesitate to use these. I feel better knowing this makes it easier for her and she runs up and down they way she did when she was a lot younger.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Anderson

customer_reviews.title: These are truly WONDERFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought our first steps a year or 2 ago and we didn't have any problems with them. The color is beautiful, they are sturdy, tall AND SOFT and our cats LOVE THEM. I tried buying some steps 2 weeks ago on an emergency basis but all of them were to short and also hard... So we ended up ordering those again and they came in 2 days but unfortunately the emergency passed because our cat passed away exactly on the day we received them. So we use the new one for one of our cats in the bedroom and the old ones for the other 2 cats we have in the other room. I LOVE THESE STEPS!
customer_reviews.author: Loredana Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Great for our Yorkie
customer_reviews.text: I bought these stairs so our Yorkie puppy eventually will be able to climb up onto our bed. These are the tallest I could find on the market anywhere...but I will still have to buy a piece of foam for her to reach the bed comfortably. I love that it has a removable cover that is washable. I also like that it covers the entire set of steps- it makes it easier for her to negotiate the stairs. There is no problem with sturdiness- she is only 3 lbs so I don't think she will ever squash the foam. This is the second set of foam stairs I have purchased over the years with Yorkies. They last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Not good for wood floors
customer_reviews.text: I really like these stairs they are nice looking but if you have wood floors - Its bad you will need to put some kind of rubber under them ? I have not tried it yet but I can not use till I try - I will find something like a cut up yoga mat and try before I return cause I do like it but my dog almost broke a bone when she fell over while running down it slips and slides all over the place not safe at all for my dog. I am sure great with carpet
customer_reviews.author: RABBOTT

customer_reviews.title: WOW simply the best Stairs
customer_reviews.text: These stairs are fabulous. We tried another brand and well they were less than satisfactory. But these are the best Lightweight but so study lovely cover. We bought a set of theses stairs about 7 years ago and they are still like day we bought them. But needed an other set for another home. These you can not improve on they are simply the best
customer_reviews.author: Robyn McKeown

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! They are lightweight but sturdy. We got the fluffy cream colored ones in 4 steps. They are absolutely perfect for my 15 year old chiuhauas. They were nervous at 1st but now are in and out of my bed with ease. I have managed to kick it several times and it didnt hurt my foot. Glad I didnt get plastic or wood! I love that I m going to be able to simply remove the cover and wash it. Oh and I seen some reviews say they had to assemble...not mine. We recieved one big box that had the stairs in it ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a "high" bed.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect height for my daughter's bed which is quite high. Makes it so easy for our Cock-a-lier to get up on the bed. Still trying to make her understand she can come down them too. She continues to jump off which is not good. Working on it. Not sure if it would work well for a large size dog, the stairs seem a little shallow for a large dog. Our dog is 20 lbs. Highly recommend. Comes in smaller sizes (we got five step) for lower beds. Love the white color, shouldn't really get dirty in the bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: It took a little encouragement and patience, but after ...
customer_reviews.text: It took a little encouragement and patience, but after a couple of days of luring her up and down with treats, our senior chihuahua mix loves these stairs. She was initially terrified to come down them and still preferred to jump off of the relatively tall bed, but we coaxed her down a step at a time with some peanut butter a few times. There have been a couple of times when she's been a bit too enthusiastic and jumped onto the stairs from the bed and they tipped a bit, but this could probably solved with some velcro on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Norah

customer_reviews.title: The photo looks more off-white which was fine with me
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the "white" one. The photo looks more off-white which was fine with me. But in person it's very yellow with a pinkish hue. It looks like I took the one in the photo and washed it with a bunch of orange and red towels. For the price I would expect the color to be a little more accurate and if it's not accurate at least be an appealing color to look at like white, cream, or beige. Just not yellowish pink.
customer_reviews.author: Meissa

customer_reviews.title: Quality Construction - Made of Solid Foam
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product. I read a number of reviews before buying these doggie stairs and now that I have the stairs in my home I'm convinced the one star reviews were intended for another product. The stairs are MADE OF FOAM and are very comfortable for my 12lb little dog. I have found myself using the stairs as an ottoman, so I find the stairs comfortable too. My dog took to the stairs right away and having 5 steps allows my dog to cross between my bed and the steps more confidently. These stairs are a huge improvement over the chintzy fleece covered plastic steps sold at drug stores.
customer_reviews.author: Kingsley Spitz

customer_reviews.title: Bambi's stairway
customer_reviews.text: I had to fit it between two of my recliners, my little Chi was afraid of falling. She goes down the steps really well since I repositioned them, she is still a little frightened of climbing up the steps but has found that if she gets into one of the recliners she will not fall.....so the fear is less now. I think in time she will use it both ways..
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for arthritic cat
customer_reviews.text: My elderly cat was no longer able to jump onto the bed because of arthritis and she sometimes woke me up when she was trying to get up. After considering the options, I decided to try these steps and they are the perfect solution. Since our bed is somewhat high, the 5-step seemed necessary. Since it is at the end of the bed, I didn't want steps made of wood because of the chance of running into them during the night. The foam is sturdy but soft. It didn't take long for my cat to figure it out and now she can come and go during the night without waking me up.
customer_reviews.author: L. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: He has a tendency to run up the steps and they're not very sturdy so when they wobble some he doesn't like it
customer_reviews.text: My 13 yr old Bichon is still trying to get used to using the stairs. He has a tendency to run up the steps and they're not very sturdy so when they wobble some he doesn't like it. He weighs 19 pounds which is not overly heavy. they could be a little sturdier. If you go straight up they are fine but usually when he pushes off from the top step they wobble and he does not like that at all. They are the perfect height for my large high king bed so I hope he does eventually get used to using them.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: soft and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My pups use it to climb on our bed every day. It did take getting use to at first but once they got the hang of climbing it, they just took off on it. It's soft so they won't hurt themselves and sturdy enough that it won't collapse either. Super light if we have to re-arrange it around the room so carrying is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ela VC

customer_reviews.title: Sleek
customer_reviews.text: Sleek in shape and fabric and width. Much more aesthetically pleasing than the popular plastic frame that has fake sherpa covering the three stairs (which I have). I got new dark brown flooring and new 18” bed frame. Purchased for my elderly cats. Each step is about 4.5 inches. No issues for cats getting up and down. Not too narrow and not too wide. This would be fine for a toy dog too. I accidentally stepped on lower step this morning with one foot. Wow. This is a solid product. I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sunkiss

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Rocks..
customer_reviews.text: It is a good idea but it is all foam and is not as firm as I would have hoped for a heavier dog. It is a bit spendy for what it is, so I decided to look at other options. However I was not able to find anything any better for under $100.00 so I re-ordered one of these that has some cosmetic damage and that was about $20 less money as a result. I can make it work for the lower cost of the slightly damaged one. Thanks Amazon for allowing me such a painless return and re-purchase. ANAZON ROCKS . .. I order from Amazon at least once a week every week.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bodreau

customer_reviews.title: Stairs my dog will use
customer_reviews.text: I tried to save some money and create a staircase for my dog using recycled boxes. She didn't trust them enough to use them so I bought her these so she stops jumping off the bed. It took maybe a day or two for her to get use to the stairs made of firm memory foam. It has been about a month since we had them but it's still holding up and I like that you can remove the case to wash. Note: I have a Pomeranian who weighs 8 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My teacup puppy loves these stairs, as do I. I showed her one time, and she uses it all the time. She loves going fast up and down I use them by my bed as it's very high. I am disabled so her being able to let herself up and down, especially for using the potty, is a huge benefit. They're very sturdy. The steps are narrow which is not a big deal. They do stick out some so you'll need 2ft ish. I and certain the unit is sturdy enough for heavier mid size dogs. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Best steps available
customer_reviews.text: This is not the troublesome fabric-covered heavy-frame behemoth sold in pet stores. This is an elegant invention using intelligent materials. That is why it is more expensive. Plato would appreciate the fulfillment of form with content. This is a welcome addition to any environment, not one more thing to trip over until it's time to send it to the landfill. This is a valuable asset to be handed down with a very great deal of respect.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have an elderly cat, and wanted to make it easier for her to get up to higher places where she likes to sleep. These steps are very well-made, very light to move around, and had absolutely no smell when I received them. I bought two different sizes, one with a sheepskin cover and the other with the gray fabric. My cat learned how to use them right away. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Anyhoozy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Easy to move out of the way if ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Easy to move out of the way if I need to. The dogs (chihuahua and Chinese crested) love it, retired no training to use it, just saw it and proceeded to run up and down at will. Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Creed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect doggie stairs!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! Soft, sturdy and light weight! Our dog uses them all the time to get on and off the bed and in and out of the back of our SUV.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: These stairs are sturdy enough to support her 40lb frame
customer_reviews.text: Our Bassett was diagnosed with cancer earlier this summer and was too weak to hop on our bed. These stairs are sturdy enough to support her 40lb frame, but soft enough that I don't get hurt when I bump into them most mornings! The cover is also super easy to clean. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Paxson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for MinPins
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Minipin. These are the ONLY stairs my dog will use, had to get rid of my other two styles since my dog won't use anything but these now lol. They are sturdy, firm and great for small dogs. My dog is 11lbs and this is more than enough support, durability and comfort he needs. I have ordered a total of three of these for our home and they are perfect. They also match all our furniture and i have in three different colors. Thank you, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: H. FISHBURN

customer_reviews.title: Great stairs!
customer_reviews.text: We had recently moved to a smaller home and could no longer use our previous steps. This one is perfect! Still high enough for our tall bed, yet doesn’t take up as much room. Our chihuahua and MinPinChi are happy campers!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Dog Stairs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these steps for my little boy Chihuahua, and for him, they're perfect!! I chose the lambswool cover and it's delightful. They're easy to move around. Made of a solid, firm foam. Not made for a big dog but just right for the small to mid-sized pups. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Worth the Cost!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST! My bed is rather tall and I've tried several other, cheaper, stairs/ladders that were plastic and didn't give my mini wiener dog anything to grip on or they were too short or they fell apart almost immediately. This 5 step design is soft so she can grip and it goes nearly to the top of my mattress so she can easily get on or off when she wants to. I watched her fly off the top of my bed many times and always worried about her spine. Now I don't have to anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Tueddii

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: These stairs were perfect for what we were hoping for. My wife and I have two small dogs (12 pound JR Terrier and a 4 pound Maltese). They like to run up to the couch and bed. Before they were unable to make it up without assistance. Now, after taking a few days to get used to it they love it! They run up and down like pros! Great size, weight and strength! This is perfect to move when you need to as it is light but sturdy! Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Chris E

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely purrrfect!
customer_reviews.text: My 20-year old cat likes to sleep with a human. He has jumped up and down from our beds for years, but I could see he was hesitating lately. I ordered these stairs, guided him up and down a few times, and he LOVES them (or at least he USES them--he's a cat). Each step is just the right height--he smoothly goes up and down. The whole ensemble is light to carry and covered by soft, warm material. Exactly what I was looking for. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M C

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 10 year old toy poodle after she developed arthritis in her shoulder. She learned how to go up and down in about a minute and now uses them without supervision to get on and off our high profile bed. The foam is quite firm with a lambswool type cover and non-skid covering on the base. These do not move out of place even after multiple uses. We also bought the shorter 3-step version so she could get on and off the sofa. While these are pricey they have helped tremendously making them worth every penny. She no longer limps with her front let raised. Thank you for a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Love these stairs!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT quality and my little guy runs up and down them! I really like these and how well they are made. Very happy with my purchase. If you have hard wood floors like I do you might want to use a rug underneath as they can slide a bit. Other wise all is well!
customer_reviews.author: 🐰 Bunny 🐰

customer_reviews.title: Thick & sturdy yet soft foam that is covered in this light ...
customer_reviews.text: Thick & sturdy yet soft foam that is covered in this light beige plush material that my dog loves. She's a 6 pound yorkie and has depended on me as her elevator for 4 years. I finally bit the bullet and ordered her her own stairs. My bed is high and these were perfect. As soon as I placed them next to the bed she ran right up them. Now she has independence...and I have sleep! Great quality. One piece quality foam -NOT pieced plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Amyzone

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I used to use various types of hard plastic steps for my dogs. I have a Chihuahua and 2 Dachshunds. the dogs had issues with the hard plastic ones because of their toenails (they get a bit long sometimes) and the long bodies. these steps have small steps, the carpet on it is very good and the soft padding is perfect (stiff). I TOTALLY recommend for very small breeds. A large breed would quickly break it down. I have had it for about a year.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great stairs for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Stairs came up right to the bed like desired (other steps did not go high enough), so works well as a way for my small and old dogs to get up on the bed themselves. The only downside was there isn't a convenient way to grab it to move it. I have to move it every day to make the bed and then put it back. Without anything as a handheld, it is a bit awkward. Not a big deal, but something that could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Bones

customer_reviews.title: My elderly cat loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My 19 year old cat can finally get up to my bed without me picking her up every time she wants up (or down). She comes and goes as she pleases now. So happy I got these. Gives her a little independence back. The material is soft and fluffy and the height is perfect for my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: My dog stewie loves the steps and so do I.
customer_reviews.text: Although they are narrower than they appear my chaijuajah (can't spell my dog type) loves them. He couldn't get on my bed unless I picked him up before. Now he's up and down without a bit of uneasiness since it's soft and easy for him to grip. I love them too since I no longer have to put him up and down from my bed. Good job folks.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve bought
customer_reviews.text: These are the third set of dog stairs I’ve bought and are the absolute best. They are light enough to carry, but are sturdy and don’t slip. Nothing to collapse too. I bought the sheepskin for traction. My dogs use them without a problem. The smallest even sits at the top for a better view sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you have a medium to large dog. NOT STURDY ENOUGH
customer_reviews.text: This is flimsy cany really support my dogs weight. I have a very tall be which this does reach up up. However its just not sturdy enough. I ended up having to buy a new one that was much more safe
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: A big help for my little Monkey
customer_reviews.text: My little Monkey who is, well she might be a Chihuahua, but I like to think of her as a Mini-Pin, is getting a bit older now. She always was able to jump up and down and she still can bless her heart, but I can see she stops and thinks twice before making the jump... and that's no good. So the last time I saw her hesitate, I thought I need to hook her up with some steps... Found this on Amazon, looked good and I am, and my Monkey is, very happy. I actually just ordered a 4 stepper for the couch for her as well.
customer_reviews.author: IGOTTAGO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stairs
customer_reviews.text: I received the stairs today and love them!!! They are perfect for my little chis- the color is amazing. After stubbing my toe at night a few times these are perfect- they won’t hurt Very sturdy yet lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty compact for how tall it is
customer_reviews.text: My yorkipoo tore a tendon in her back knee. She's not supposed to jump around much, this will be a lifelong issue, so I have to keep as much stress off her back legs as possible. She sleeps in bed with me, so instead of having her jump up when I wasn't looking, I got this... LIFESAVER!!! It's pretty compact for how tall it is, it's soft so it doesn't bother their joints, it's very lightweight, it's all around awesome. My kitty has even started using it. lol. TOTALLY worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Casey W.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Stairs For The Dog
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height for my tall bed. My dog no longer has to jump hard from the top step. It's sturdy but soft so it helps if your dog has back problem. It's the best stairs I've ever got for my little.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Stairway to ... relief!
customer_reviews.text: Our 10lb dog suffered a back injury so could no longer get up on our high-profile bed. The 5-step stairs were the perfect answer to our dilemna. First, they are constructed of a lightweight foam that makes them easy for humans to move,, yet is remarkably sturdy when in use by the furry one! The gripping material on the bottom keeps the stairway firmly in place even when our dog is racing up and down, and the faux sheepskin covering is subtle enough to blend in with my decor. Such an easy solution for what was a sad situation! Love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: DukeCityGirl

customer_reviews.title: Saved the day for our cat
customer_reviews.text: Our house cat is getting on in years and is getting arthritis in his joints. We have a tall adjustable bed and he stopped sleeping with us because it hurt his to jump up or down. These steps fixed him right up! They were perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Adwizards

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our arthritic cat!
customer_reviews.text: Our senior cat is on medication for a fused spine and severe arthritis. Our bed was so high up that he could no longer jump without crying in pain. Now he can reach the bed again! These pet stairs are great and it only took about 1 week to train our cat to use them regularly. The stairs are covered in a soft fabric but with a firm foam insert.
customer_reviews.author: YoYoJimbo

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t know I needed this in my life until I got one !
customer_reviews.text: Ok obviously all 3 of my dogs love this. Even my 5 lb yorkie happily goes up and down these stairs I swear she thinks it’s fun. It’s nice that they can freely go up and down whenever they please. It’s also easy to clean and I was worried about it being an eyesore but the sherpa material is actually nicer than I imagined. It’s pretty soft too, sometimes I find myself sitting on the stairs bc it is quite comfy ;)
customer_reviews.author: Chibi chibi chibi

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly for our 10LB Yorkie
customer_reviews.text: We have a one year old Yorkie and she sometimes has trouble hopping up onto our bed. While at her young age, she doesn't use the stairs frequently, they work perfectly when she does use them. The stairs seem big enough and stiff enough to support at least a medium size dog. The stairs do stick out from the bed, however, they are soft and light enough to not create much of a walking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Bennie D. Tate

customer_reviews.title: These are nice and sturdy - a little give to the foam ...
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and sturdy - a little give to the foam but not as rigid as hard steps. They are fluffy without worrying about snagging pet nails in the fluff. Also, the bottom has skid proof dots on it, and a zipper around the base allows the cover to be removed. I'm glad I got it. The size with the five steps is just right for my higher bed - I have a puppy who is still learning about steps, but once he masters them will be able to go up and down easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dasha Hill

customer_reviews.title: It is nicely made but is not sturdy enough to handle ungraceful ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my Bichon Frise (22lbs). He is not the most elegant or graceful dog. He uses this almost as a launching pad to get on the bed. This is so light it flips over all the time, leaving my Maltese with no way to get up to the bed. It is nicely made but is not sturdy enough to handle ungraceful dogs. My husband will be altering this step by putting weights on the bottom so it does not flip over.
customer_reviews.author: ai10

customer_reviews.title: Great product but my pooches were not having it at all....
customer_reviews.text: This was nice and sturdy. Unfortunately I couldn't get my 70 Lb Golden Retriever to climb it, nor my 75 Lb Goldendoodle. I don't blame the product, I blame my Retriever who can just jump on my bed, and my doodle just wasn't having it since he is used to us throwing him on the bed. Lazy bugger he is. I would recommend to anyone who has pups that are adventurous and not afraid of new things. We did try for a bit with treats but it just seemed to be more of a struggle so we just gave up. Def. liked it though. Just sorry my pups weren't into it. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected. I got this product for my 40lb Australian Sheppard to climb up and down from my bed. The product is very lightweight and slides around the floor whenever my dog attempts to walk up/down. Maybe it was my mistake for not reading all the details of this product, but it is definitely not designed for medium sized dogs to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good stair for pets that needs extra steps
customer_reviews.text: My dog is getting older and needed an stair with more steps to reach our bed. This work perfectly for her. I wish the steps were a little wider, but overall, I am satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ileana

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I was looking for. I needed high steps and bought the 5 step. I have a 8lb Maltipoo. It is sturdy enough for my daughter's medium size Boarder Collie and Miniture Australian Shepherd dog. I have it on a wood floor and doesn't slide when used. It isn't to heavy to slide or even pick up to place elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I have purchased for my 2 little dogs. These steps are perfect to prevent them from jumping off the bed and/or sofa. Small dogs are prone to subluxations of the knees from jumping and I want to prevent that. They love having the ability to get up and down on their own. The are lightweight and easy to move if needed but I leave them in place. They have one for the sofa, one for the bed, and one at the front window so they can look out during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Lola T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this foam 5 step specifically for my little Yorkie who had a sprained leg ligament. The vet advised no running or jumping. It's just the right height for the family room sofa. It's actually about 6 inches taller than the seat but just right for the pillow at the end of it. It's very sturdy and does not move on the rug. The natural color blends in nicely, too. One day he may actually use it. I kind of look at it as a training device like agility training.
customer_reviews.author: Celine Diane

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It took a couple days for my cat to start using it.. he loves it now. I like e fact that I can separate the cover and wash it. It’s sturdy and doesn’t move around. Wish it offered cute cover options tho.. sold separately..
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoCat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  Strong!  So well made!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Just what I needed! So well made! My senior Westie...with some arthritis...and almost 13yrs old... refused to do steps when young, but now in minutes learned she can get up and down from a bed safely with these 5 steps!! So glad I tried again!
customer_reviews.author: SNRNAZ

customer_reviews.title: Maybe buy it early and train your dog as a puppy
customer_reviews.text: I gave it three cause I wish it was wider. It seems that if they were wider my dog would have used it. He is a medium to large breed so maybe I should have done more research. Overall it’s a good product and our bed is really high so it’s a little to top heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my aging little dog. We had hard plastic stairs before but because of his failing eyesight he would trip and fall off of hard plastic steps. These were perfect, they are not too soft and he does not slide off them. He was able to use these very easily and grip the stairs as he was going up or down. Thank You so much! I had only wished I had found these sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Chrismhb

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Our doggies sleep with us so getting up and down is a must with short legs. Provides great exercise for small dogs to play Chase the Toy 30 times before bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Travelcutie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect x2
customer_reviews.text: I've had this in the 3 step variant, and loved it so much I bought another in the 5 step variant. These are easy for dogs to use. Being foam they are light weight and no one gets hurt tripping over them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Ernie loves them
customer_reviews.text: My little guy needed some encouragement to start using these, but now he uses them all the time (its been a week since they arrived). They were delivered when promised. Wrapped in plastic in a giant box. The reason for the 4 stars is that sometimes he tries to jump off them onto the bed when he's about halfway up and they're very wobbly when he does that. I think maybe its because they're not very wide. But if he just walks up, there's no issue with wobbling. Everything considered, I would recommend them and would order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Non slip sturdy steps.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice, non slip steps. We have tackled coming down. So far will go up with help and coaching, we are getting there! ***AFTER 3 DAYS she is a wiz on these stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Marily

customer_reviews.title: Very Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Our queen bed is to high for our poodle to jump on. With these stairs next to the bed she just climbs right up to the bed. It's very lightweight. I like the fact it is all foam so if you stub your foot or toe on it there is no pain.
customer_reviews.author: bvretr1

customer_reviews.title: Yorkie running down the steps off the bed - Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed! My sweet 4 lb Yorkie hurt herself jumping off the bed. So I bought these soft steps. I put a little snack on each step to get her to go up, and then a snack on each step to go down. We did that about 3 times. Within the next hour, she had figured it out and got on the bed without any trouble! Her favorite thing to do is get off the bed - especially if she hears someone at the door. She runs downs those steps so fast - she's a blurr!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Best stairs you will ever buy.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! Totally durable, yet light weight. We have 2 little Maltese, and a Pomeranian. They have no problems getting up and down. Other pet stairs just weren’t high enough, these are perfect. Out of the 5 previous stairs, these by far are the best. My dogs have no problems. They are perfect, very easy for them to use. So glad I found them.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Wuebkes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Sturdy, yet soft for paws without claws getting caught in the fabric. It only took one time showing my cat Henry how to climb up and down and he uses it each time. My only regret is not getting this sooner. Definitely decreases the impact on their joints vs jumping up and down. Highly recommended the 5 step for higher beds like mine...others would have been too short to make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height and terrific for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height for our bed. Strudy construction but easy to move. Highly recommended! We went with dark brown even though some of the prints were cute. Too bad they are extra money.
customer_reviews.author: mamapapa

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves her new stairs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, solved our aging kitty’s problem with getting to her food bowl (stored on a counter). Funny, she loves her stairs and seems to delight in running up and down them.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Tall bed, small dogs, perfect solution.
customer_reviews.text: Tall bed, small dogs, perfect solution. Our room is also small, so needed something we wouldn't break toes on when we inevitably trip or kick this thing. This works super well. Dogs took to it right away. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Randi DuFresne

customer_reviews.title: Just the right height, sturdy and my dog loves them!!!
customer_reviews.text: The steps were the perfect height for my bed. It only took one time to persuade my baby Sheba to go up them. After that she was off and a running. She loves her steps!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Harm

customer_reviews.title: THESE STEPS HAVE BEEN ONE OF THE BEST PURCHASES THAT I HAVE MADE
customer_reviews.text: THESE STEPS HAVE BEEN ONE OF THE BEST PURCHASES THAT I HAVE MADE . MY TINY PUP AND SENIOR KITTY BOTH USE THE STEPS WITH EASE . NOTE: I APPRECIATE AND THANK THE WONDERFUL FOLKS WHO TOOK THE TIME TO WRITE PREVIEWS AND ANSWER (PERSONALLY) MY QUESTION'S PRIOR TO MY PURCHASE , THEY HELPED MAKE MY FUR BABY'S LIFES A LITTLE MORE COMFORTABLE .
customer_reviews.author: Maria B.

customer_reviews.title: These stairs are excellent. Our Toy Fox Terrier is 12 years old ...
customer_reviews.text: These stairs are excellent. Our Toy Fox Terrier is 12 years old and has started experiencing Arthritis. He can now easily get up on our bed to sleep. Before he only had a 3 step which was soft foam and the last time he jumped off the bed onto those stairs he hurt his shoulder. These steps are a stiffer foam material and he has no problem now. 8:00 pm he goes to bed all by himself. I recommend this product and supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene D. Odom

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our Chihuahua to get onto our high profile king bed. Both him and the cat use it. It's firm enough for me to use and it has held its shape very well. Happy with the purchase overall and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsi

customer_reviews.title: Great stairs for older dog.
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old Shih Tzu started having a little trouble jumping up on the bed so I did a lot of research and settled on this step. She learned to use it very quickly. It's light weight but sturdy and very soft. She appears to be very comfortable going up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Angerstein

customer_reviews.title: Pet Stairs
customer_reviews.text: My dog has short legs and can't jump on my bed by herself. I'm so glad I bought these. It only took a few times and my dog could go up and down with no problem. She is only 13 lbs so I wouldn't get them for a heavy dog.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and soft
customer_reviews.text: I love these steps. I bought them for 3 places!! The dogs feel secure and they are a great height for higher beds. Highly recommended . I have 2 King Charles spaniels.
customer_reviews.author: dyan kirshenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My cat Gema was diagnosed with stage 4 stomach cancer. She could no longer get onto the bed. These steps really helped us and Gema during her last few months. This product is extremely stable and high quality. The covering was soft. Gema started using the same day. And I feel it added some quality to her last time with us giving her movement and freedom. I would recommend this to any pet owner.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Budzilowski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Our little Maltipoo uses them all the time. I can stand on them myself so they would be great for much larger dogs too!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Salomon

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought used, but received in new/mint condition. Stairs are very sturdy and tall enough for my bed. Thank you! :)
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Well made and solid enough that my dog will run up and down but not like cardboard. Goes with every decor
customer_reviews.text: This was another pricey items that I didnt know if it would be with the money. Totally is! I use one side for my puppy to go up to ththe bed, the other side fits my sofa. Well made and solid enough that my dog will run up and down but not like cardboard. Goes with every decor. Washable.
customer_reviews.author: lisa noah

customer_reviews.title: Great product, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality stairs, my dog quickly started to use them after sniffing them out for a few minutes. I previously had heavy wood stairs that were a pain to move from room to room. I was concerned about the durability of the foam stairs, but these are very durable, retain their shape well and will even support my weight!!! Lightweight and easy to move from room to room, easy to clean. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie T.

customer_reviews.title: Animals loves must buy
customer_reviews.text: My elder cats and my kitten love this bed side" helper". So happy that my cat that could no longer jump in and out of our high bed still with these steps can come and go freely from our bed
customer_reviews.author: Michael Widman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for getting in the bed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for getting in the bed. Our 18lb 6 yr old female is hesitant but has gone up and down with our help. If it were more secured to the floor we think she would not hesitate. Previously purchased a cheap plastic one. No way would she use that one. 5 steps for bed. 4 steps for sofas.
customer_reviews.author: janet rust

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: My dog weighs 8#. He learned how to climb up the stairs in a couple tries. Now he runs up and down the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Great steps
customer_reviews.text: These steps allow my grand dog to get on the bed and also my puppy to join us also. They are easy to move and easy to vacuum. I have had them almost a year and I could not survive without them.
customer_reviews.author: fashionableMiMi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stairs to reach a high bed. Really nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, well made fleece stairs on a foam base that will not break - as some that have plastic frames that snap together. The color, Ivory, would fit any decor. Our two Shih Tsus love it and it reaches our new high convertible bed. Exactly what I wanted and it even has a nice big zipper so it can be taken off and washed. Couldn't have asked for a better addition to our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I wish they were wider.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs use this. At first they were tentative, but then they got used to them. You have to have something on the other side, or your dogs will not feel safe going up them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and light weight👍
customer_reviews.text: I have always had small dogs. These are perfect for them to get up on the bed or sofa they’re not supposed to jump. They last for many years
customer_reviews.author: Drennen Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for a small senior dog
customer_reviews.text: My older dog had alot easier time getting up on the bed. Best investment ever for my senior dog
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Doggie and kitty leg saver
customer_reviews.text: Took my Havanese a few days and a little coaxing to use them, but they are great and plenty tall for my high bed
customer_reviews.author: Robin Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for older/small dogs
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. My bed is pretty high so my small older dogs are unable to get on my bed. With this thing now they can! I had to wedge it between my bed and my wall as it was a little wobbly but not bad. I love that it came in white to match the theme in my room!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not recomended
customer_reviews.text: I bought it and the dogs would not use it.. It was not sturdy enough and one of them fell over.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent s.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up well
customer_reviews.text: Have used for a year and it is falling apart. Foam is shredding on edge of steps and cover is wearing badly. Find another company as it is made in China
customer_reviews.author: Raveric

product_meta.title: "Made in USA Pet Steps/Stairs with CertiPUR-US Certified Foam for Dogs & Cats
product_meta.description: Color:Lambswool| Size:5-Step (H: 22.5")THE MUST HAVE PET SUPPLIES FOR SMALL DOGS Lounging Made EasyHave a small dog or puppy that has a rough time trying to hop on that comfy couch or bed? Then they ll love these foam pet stairs! Choose between 3-step, 4-step, and 5-step configurationsto match your furniture s height and make life for your furry friend so much easier. But thesearen t your ordinary dog steps. We ve used a combination of the highest quality USA-made foam and ultra-soft fleece fabric to create a ramp that is easy on your dog s joints, provides enoughtraction for a slippery-free climb, and offers maximum durability. Now you don t have to come to the rescue every time your doggie wants to join you on the couch! Beautiful TouchWhatever your dé cor, no matter your color scheme, you ll find the right pet stairs from our collection to blend right in. Our foam pet steps come covered in a removable plush fabric that is available inlight brown, dark brown, animal print, white, and 2 eye-catching paw prints. And the neatest part about it all? You can switch up the look whenever you want to! We offer replacement covers for the pet stairs in all the designs, giving you the freedom to mix things up. Here are more great features of our pet stairs: Anti slip bottom and 15 width provide great stability. Gentle enough for use by pets with arthritis or joint problems. Outer cover is easily removable and machine washable. Soft foam prevents any painful moments in case you bump into the stairs. Can be easily moved from one room to another. Give your pet easy access to all the little comforts with our ultra-durable and well-made dog stairs. Click ‘ Add to Cart now!
feature_bullets: Relieves Stress: Our stairs are the perfect accessory to help pets reach that high bed or couch! Available in 3-step, 4-step, and 5-step configurations to easily match your furniture’s height.
Supports Pet Health: Made with mattress-grade cushioning to relieve pressure on paws and joints.
Save Time: Each stair cover is removable and machine-washable! No more cleaning off dirt and fur by hand.
Decorate Your Home: Available in 4 stylish patterns and 8 colors to match the personality of your home!
Quality You Can Trust: Made in the USA with premium-grade materials and CertiPUR-US Certified foam to ensure lifetime durability.
